videos.title: Welcome to Preferential
videos.description: Insurance. Wellness. Peace of mind—all in one app. From car cover to health and life protection, we’ve redesigned insurance around you.

videos.title: All Your Cover, One App
videos.description: Get car, health, life, and temporary insurance—plus cashback rewards, without the comparison site noise.

videos.title: Built for Everyday Life
videos.description: Access wellness tools, meditation, and nutrition support—because your well-being is more than just a policy.
